structure.unit: STATE AND REGIONAL MENTAL HEALTH PROGRAMS

law.text: The secretary for health and family services shall have authority to prescribe rules and regulations for the administration of the cabinet and of the institutions under the control of the cabinet, including power to regulate the payment of money to patients in mental institutions for work performed.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 299, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 244, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 53. -- Amended 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 164, sec. 3. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 50, sec. 1.
